/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in shades of red and white, their architectural style reminiscent of traditional Chinese design. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the foreground, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the red and white of the buildings.
